data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Taipei, Taiwan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Taipei, Taiwan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Taipei with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Taipei, Taiwan.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Taipei, Taiwan.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 89,638 believers in Taipei, Taiwan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Saaroa people. Make the Saaroa people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, help the 89,638 believers in Taipei to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Taipei, Taiwan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Taipei, Taiwan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
